function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in multi-purpose urban gardens","Impact":"Spread of disease among residents and visitors, increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, regular disinfection of common areas, and promoting personal hygiene practices","Technologies":"Smart monitoring systems to track occupancy, air quality sensors to monitor ventilation, and touchless technologies for entry and exit","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in the urban gardens","Owner":"Building management and local authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of remote work environment safety measures in multi-purpose urban gardens","Impact":"Risk of transmission in shared workspaces, potential exposure to infected individuals","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict hygiene protocols, maintaining physical distance between workstations, and providing adequate ventilation and air filtration","Technologies":"Plastic barriers between workstations, HEPA filters for air purification, and touchless technology for shared equipment","People":"Residents and workers using the remote workspaces","Owner":"Building management and employers"},{"Description":"Increased density and social interaction leading to higher risk of disease transmission in the residential area","Impact":"Elevated chance of disease spread, greater impact on vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of people in common areas, promoting outdoor activities, and encouraging vaccination and testing","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and vaccination verification technology","People":"Residents of the residential area, particularly vulnerable populations","Owner":"Local authorities and community organizations"}]}
